channel.title: Make an EcoServer to a SpawnServer?
channel.description:
Hello Guys,
How do i make an eco server in to a spawn server like everyone can spawn stuff etc. That would be awesome to know because i have my server online for like 2 years now and it doesnt have D-Claws and the new items etc. I only run my server for friends etc and i would like to know how to make it a spawn server.
Thanks,
Remco.

item.title: Make an EcoServer to a SpawnServer?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

Yeah add it on config.java

Read full topic

Where do i change the Public Ints?=]

Serverconfig right?

item.source: Make an EcoServer to a SpawnServer?

item.title: Make an EcoServer to a SpawnServer?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Amazed_Carlo Project Amazed Carlos
item.description:
@Project_Amazed_Carlo wrote:

All you have to do buddy is add “item” in the commands for everyone to use then use public ints to make some items not spawnable.

And you have a spawn server.

Read full topic
